markup.description: The Textfield Slider pairs a slider and textfield and synchronizes the input between them. The Textfield Stepper similarly links a control to a textfield, but in this case uses a pair of buttons; which act as steppers for increasing and decreasing the value.
markup.instructions:
• Use the mouse or keyboard to adjust the value via the slider thumb.
  • Enter a value between 0 and 10 in the textfield
  • Use the mouse or keyboard to trigger the "-" or "+" buttons to decrease or increase the value respectively.
